targets.query: SELECT difference(last("KILOWATT_HOURS")) FROM "power_meter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("KILOWATT_HOURS") FROM "power_meter" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("SAMPLE_RATE") FROM "power_meter" WHERE  ("level"::tag = 'INFO') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("MESSAGE") FROM "power_meter" WHERE  ("level"::tag = 'DEBUG') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("MESSAGE") FROM "power_meter" WHERE  ("level"::tag = 'WARN') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("MESSAGE") FROM "power_meter" WHERE  ("level"::tag = 'ERROR') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT count("MESSAGE") FROM "power_meter" WHERE  ("level"::tag = 'FATAL') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
